name: Is everything just BLACK and WHITE
name_original: Is everything just BLACK and WHITE
description:
"Is everything just black and white" is a puzzle platformer that has the player jumping from room to room while reveal hidden hazards and ground that otherwise can't be seen without lights. 

The player must traverse from room to room activating these lights with pressure plates and switches and in some cases memorizing where the hazards may lie. 

Short and simple platforming with fun little memory games and puzzles.

Lead Programming, Game Design, Sound and Level Design by WhatIsRove

2D art, Level Design, Sound Design by Starwolf1900

Special Thanks to fellow game jammer

Iodinex64 - For quickly whipping up background ambient music after already finishing his game.

Go follow his SoundCloud at https://soundcloud.com/iodinex64
